short_description: ivc brasil is an outdoor advertising services company based in brazil.
long_description: a importância do ivc na publicidade: transparência e confiabilidade são a garantia de excelência na auditoria de mídia. valores e associe-se. serviço de auditoria multiplataforma, que contemplam circulação e distribuição de jornais e revistas, publicações digitais, eventos, audiência na web, incluindo devices móveis, aplicativos e web radio. acesso completo aos dados sobre circulação e distribuição de mídia impressa, tráfego em diversos formatos de mídias digitais, frequência em eventos e alcance de campanhas para empresas e agências que comercializam espaço publicitário.
business_tags: campaign reporting | media search | media studies | advertising agency | magazines and newspaper | newspaper distribution | print media | auditing services | media distribution | media formats | home / office | smartphones & tablets | eating & food | upcoming trials | incentive plans
generated_description: ivc brasil is a non-profit organization based in são paulo, brazil, dedicated to certifying the performance metrics of both printed and digital media. the company provides multi-platform auditing services, including circulation and distribution of newspapers and magazines, digital publications, events, web traffic, and out-of-home media campaigns. ivc brasil aims to offer the market unbiased and detailed data on media communication, including web traffic from desktops, smartphones, tablets, and applications, as well as circulation, frequency, and campaign reach for advertising agencies and advertisers. the organization is composed of representatives from advertisers, advertising agencies, and publishers.
